title: IN THE HOLLOW OF HIS HANDS

content.chorus:
In the hollow (in the hollow) of His hands
In the hollow of His hands
I am safe whatever may betide me
In the hollow of His hands
verses:
With my Saviour ever near to guide
I am safe whatever may betide me
From the storm and tempest he will guide me
In the hollow of His hands

His arms of love he doth enfold me
Words of peace His voice divine hath told me
I am safe for God Himself doth hold me
In the hollow of His hands

He will guard my soul and leave me never
From His love no power on earth shall severs
And I know he'll keep me now and ever
In the hollow of His hands
